content.require_tag_to_start_desc: If enabled, an authorized tag is required to start charging. The web interface can still be used to charge without tag.
content.require_tag_to_stop_desc: If enabled, an authorized tag is required to stop charging. The web interface cann still be used to stop charging. Warning: The stop function of the front panel button will be deactivated!
content.warp1_require_tag_to_stop_desc: If enabled, an authorized tag is required to stop charging. The web interface cann still be used to stop charging. Warning: The stop function of the front panel button can not be deactivated for WARP 1 chargers!
content.add_tag_description: Hold the new tag to the right side of the charger. Tag ID and type can also be typed in manually.

script.add_tag_disabled: Only up to 8 tags are supported.
script.save_failed: Failed to update the NFC configuration
